channel.title: The Vault
channel.description:
[center]
*
I encourage you to come and join our new community. We offer forums to discuss the game and to just relax and talk in the lounge. We are currently giving away 4 VIP spots to the next 4 members of our forum. We also offer a marketplace section for both games. We have mature and active staff. We take the forums seriously and don't put up with LQ posters and immature members. We have rules that you must follow. I encourage you to join us at VIP SPOTS TAKEN![/center] If this is not allowed I am very sorry :(

item.title: The Vault
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You’re correct, this is not allowed. This is for SERVER advertisements.
